    @allure.title("Open deal new buy trade request")
    def test_open_new_buy_trade_request(self, page: Page, create_session):
        deal_details_page = DealDetailsPage(page)
        login_page = LoginPage(page)
        notifications = Notifications(page)
        deals_api = DealsApi()
        failed_message = "Available balance {}"
    
        with allure.step("Test preparation"):
            running_deals = deals_api.get_poloniex_running_deals()
            total_deals = running_deals['total']
            deal_id = None
    
            if total_deals == 0:
                pytest.skip("There are no deals in Running status")
    
            for deal in running_deals['items']:
                if deal['actions']['trade']:
                    deal_id = deal['id']
                    break
    
            if deal_id is None:
                pytest.skip("There are no deals with 'trade' action available")
    
            login_page.goto()
            create_session()
    
        with allure.step(f"Go to deals details page with id: {deal_id}"):
            deal_details_page.goto(endpoint=deal_details_page.slug.format(deal_id))
    
        with allure.step("Get available balance"):
            available_balance = deals_api.get_deal_available_balance(deal_id)
    
        with allure.step("Open new buy trade request"):
            deal_details_page.click_open_new_buy_btn()
    
        with allure.step("Verify deal start"):
            if float(available_balance) <= 10:
>               assert notifications.wait_for_unsuccessful_toast() is True
